item.title: Errata: Functional Programming in R
item.description:
Chapter 2

The Structure of a Recursive Function, page 32:

“Here I am assuming that is an integer…” should be “Here I am assuming that n is an integer…”

Chapter 3

Nested Functions and Scopes, page 53ff.

The code defines function g as g <- function(y) x + y but in the environment chains g is defined as g <- function(y) x + 1; that should also be g <- function(y) x + y.

item.title: Errata: Functional Data-Structures in R
item.description: One big regret I have about this book is that I didn’t implement the pattern matching code from Domain-Specific Languages in R before this book. Pattern matching makes implementing data structures much easier.
